entry.title: SONAX Profiline Fine Abrasive Paste 05-04 1L
entry.summary:
Vendor: sonax
Type: Polish
Price: 59.99

SONAX Profiline Fine Abrasive Paste is a polish for weathered and scratched paintwork. Removes dust occlusion, paint overspray, sanding marks and scratches. Silicone-free. Low Dust technology, use with SONAX Lambskin 130mm Pad Part # 04931410 or SONAX Polishing Pad Yellow 160mm Part # 04931000

entry.title: SONAX Profiline Perfect Finish 04-06 ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 99.99 - 429.99 (2 variants)

SONAX Profiline Perfect Finish is an innovative paintwork finishing polish for a 1 step polishing of sanded down, localised paintwork damage such as dust occlusion or paint runs. Silicone-free. For rotary machines 4/6 Cut, 6/6 Gloss, Use with SONAX Polishing Pad Green 160mm Part # 04930000

entry.title: SONAX Profiline CutMax 06-04 ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 29.99 - 189.99 (3 variants)

SONAX Profiline CutMax 06-04 is a fast acting and with an outstanding quality in surface finish. Removes scratches and inclusions from refinishing work or the original factory paintwork. Leaves only minimal treatment marks and virtually no polish residues (Low Dust Technology!). Easy to handle, High abrasion with simultaneous minimal dullness, silicone free and low in dust. For rotary machines, Use with SONAX Lambskin 130mm Pad Part # 04931410 or SONAX Cutting Pad Red, 80mm Part # 04937000, 160mm Part # 493 100, 200mm Part # 04937410

entry.title: SONAX Profiline Headlight Polish Profi Refill 250ml ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Headlight Restorer
Price: 29.99

SONAX Profiline Headlight Polish Profi Refill is a special abrasive polish for freshening up yellowed and matt plastic headlights. Removes minor to medium scratches, restores the original clarity Ensures an optimum luninous efficiency. Increases driving safety and enhances the overall appearance. For front and rear headlights. For use with a polishing machine.

entry.title: SONAX Rubber Protectant 100ml w/applicator ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Interior & Exterior Dressings
Price: 12.99

SONAX Rubber Protectant cleans and maintains rubber car components and maintains their elasticity. Extends working life of the rubber and freshens up the colours. Also effortlessly cleans tires and floor mats, and restores their original fresh appearance.

entry.title: SONAX Plastic Restorer Gel – 250ml Tube ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Interior & Exterior Dressings
Price: 19.99

SONAX Plastic Restorer Gel maintains unpainted, plastic components on vehicle exteriors. Microscopic Nano particles penetrate deeply into the grained and structured surfaces, thereby providing long-lasting protection and long-term conservation. The transparent gel is suitable for all colors; revitalizing bumpers, trim & exterior components, giving them a deep, rich shine. Also ideal for tires & rubber components.

entry.title: SONAX Tire Gloss Gel 500ml ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polish
Type: dressing
Price: 22.99

SONAX Tire Gloss Gel brings your tires back to life. The innovative gel formula maintains the rubber and simultaneously protects against cracking and discoloration. Simply apply and leave for a wet look; or apply, wait a few minutes and wipe down with a dry cloth for a clean and conditioned appearance. Simple to apply – you will be amazed at the long-lasting performance with tremendous results.

entry.title: SONAX Tree Sap Remover 400ml ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Tree Sap Remover
Price: 17.99

Tree Sap Remover is specially developed to remove tree sap, bird droppings and other organic deposits from paintwork, glass, chrome, vinyl wrap and plastic surfaces. Tree Sap Remover accomplishes an effortless clean look free from residues. Even high quality XENON headlights, and anti-glare plastic headlights in clear glass design can be treated without problems. It is also gentle on surfaces and is non abbrasive to your vehicle’s finish.

Start by washing your vehicle with car shampoo. Simply apply the product to the desired area. Tree Sap Remover takes effect in seconds and breaks down tree sap and other organic matter. Wipe contaminants away with a microfiber cloth in order to be as gentle as possible on the painted finish.

entry.title: SONAX Profiline EX 04-06 1L – Orbital ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 29.99 - 189.99 (3 variants)

SONAX Profiline EX 04-06 is a special professional polish for orbital machines. Provides optimal scratch removal, impressing deep shine and outstanding restoration of colours. In single-level processes, it yields results that had previously been possible with rotary processes only. For a top hologram-free result. Silicone free and low dusting (low-dust technology). Use with SONAX Polishing Pad Yellow 160mm Part # 04933410

entry.title: SONAX Engine Cleaner 500ml ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: All Purpose Cleaners & Degreaser
Price: 14.99

Quickly and reliably cleans all oil and grease from engines, machine and assembly parts and tools. The product has an outstanding infiltration ability, enabling it to reach even the most inaccessible places. Phosphate-free, solvent-free.

entry.title: SONAX Insect Remover 500ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Bug Remover
Price: 13.99

SONAX Insect Remover effectively penetrates & loosens dense, dried-on insect residue. A simple rinse or mild agitation will quickly remove any contaminants. For best results, apply the product when the vehicle is dry prior to washing. Insect Remover is safe for use on glass, chrome, paint & plastic components.

entry.title: Sonax ProfiLine Cut & Finish Innovative Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 52.65

Sonax ProfiLine Cut & Finish Innovative polish with intense abrasive effect for quickly eradicating defective spots, such as dust occlusion, paint overspray and sanding marks, following repair spraying. High abrasion with simultaneous good degree of shine, workable for a long time, with outstanding wipe off feature. Ideal for polishing sanded down surfaces. Sonax ProfiLine Cut & Finish removes sanding grooves made by P1500 abrasive paper. Silicone-free.

entry.title: Sonax ProfiLine Nano Polish 03-06
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 59.99

SONAX Profiline Nano Polish 03-06 is a Silicon-free polish for matt and scratched paintwork and scratch-proof clear paint. Ideal as finish after applying abrasive polishes. The use of a new type of nano-sized abrasives enables rapid polishing, while effectively removing scratches and producing a brilliant gloss. Removes sanding marks of P2500 sand papers. Hologram-free polishing result.

entry.title: Sonax Wheel Cleaner Plus
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: wheel maintenance
Price: 29.99 - 1999.99 (4 variants)

SONAX Wheel Cleaner Plus is the latest formulation for fast and effective removal of stubborn brake dust and road grime. The powerful wheel cleaner is 30% stronger and works much faster than SONAX Wheel Cleaner full effect. PLUS sprays on clear and turns red almost instantly as it begins to work. Because it is acid-free, Wheel Cleaner PLUS is safe for use on all wheel types and will not damage or corrode wheel bolts.

entry.title: Sonax Profiline Polymer Net Shield Sealant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 11.99 - 34.99 (2 variants)

SONAX Polymer Net Shield is a polymer based sealant that creates a bonded layer of protection agains the elements. The application is quick and easy; takes only 15 minutes to treat a medium-sized vehicle. The sealant achieves excellent water repellency for up to six (6) months. Apply with SONAX Application Sponge. Part # 04173000

entry.title: Sonax Profiline UltimateCut Compound
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 99.99 - 499.99 (2 variants)

ONAX Profiline UltimateCut 06-03 Compound is a highly effective abrasive polish for high processing speeds, contains high purity, extremely hard aluminium oxide.

• Cut 6+, removes sanding marks up to P1000 even faster. Gloss 3.
• wide processing window, stays open longer
• Easily wiped away
• Clean and economical thanks to Low Dust Technology
• Multi languages label

Application
1.If necessary, first sand the paintwork with abrasive paper in the grain size P1000 (or finer).
2.Use either a rotational polishing machine with the Lambskin Pad 133 (04931410) or an orbital polishing machine with the Hybrid Wool Pad 143DA (04938000). The machines can be tilted slightly at the outset. Afterwards apply the pad level and, particularly on fresh paintwork, carry out the polishing in several short passes.
3.Wipe off polish residues with a Microfibre Cloth ultra fine (04507000). Polish afterwards to a high gloss with Perfect Finish (02243000).

entry.title: Sonax Plastic Care
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Plastic
Price: 13.99 - 109.99 (3 variants)

SONAX Plastic Care is the quick and universal solution for the complete vehicle: For interior use it cleans and maintains all plastic components (e.g. cockpit, door trim panels, instrument panel, centre console, seat linings etc.). Its simple application quickly ensures gleaming, streak free surfaces and intensively freshens up the colours.

In the exterior area, Plastic Care rejuvenates, protects and preserves all unpainted plastic components (e.g. bumpers, styling strips, door handles etc.), it conceals fine scratches and dull spots. In the engine bay, it is the fast and uncomplicated solution to restore the shine and protect the plastic parts there, after a cleaning.

entry.title: Sonax Leather Care Foam
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Interior & Exterior Dressings
Price: 16.99 - 44.99 (2 variants)

SONAX Leather Care Foam is an excellent 2-in-1 foam cleaner and conditioner for all colors of leather. Excellent for perforated & heated seats. This unique leather care foam has a beeswax-based formula that revives the smoothness, refreshes the colors, and restores the original suppleness, leaving no greasy residue.

SONAX Profiline CutMax 06-03 compound is a fast acting and with an outstanding quality in surface finish. Removes scratches and inclusions from refinishing work or the original factory paintwork. This compound is easy to handle.  High abrasion with simultaneous minimal dullness, silicone free and low in dust. entry.title: Sonax Profiline Speed Protect Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 37.99 - 109.99 (2 variants)

SONAX Profiline Speed Protect is an ideal protective rapid finish with Carnauba wax for new, as-new or polished paintwork surfaces. Produces surfaces intensive in colour and with impressive deep shine. Well suitable for outdoor demonstration cars. Quick application, long-lasting protection! Contains natural Carnauba wax and a special silicone emulsion to deliver that streak free, high-gloss finish. This formula is safe for use on plastics and rubber.

Our customers enjoy Speed Protect Polish for it’s fast acting application. If a longer lasting protective coating is what you are looking for, Sonax offers more new and improved solutions. Sonax also offers Speed Protect in larger formats.

entry.title: Sonax Car Shampoo Concentrate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Vehicle Washing & Glass Cleaning
Price: 14.99 - 219.99 (3 variants)

SONAX Car Shampoo Concentrate is a brilliant, surfactant-rich formula. Our 25L option is available for special order. Thick lathering action and pleasant scent. SONAX Car Wash Shampoo Concentrate is a highly effective, phosphatefree and pH-neutral formula that penetrates and loosens tough dirt without damaging or stripping the protective layer. The special anionic surfactants within, simultaneously adhere and distribute dirt leaves a brilliant, clean shine to your paint, rubber, plastic, vinyl and glass surfaces every time! Directions 50ml (2oz) in 10L (3 gallons) of warm water.

entry.title: Sonax Multistar All Purpose Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: All Purpose Cleaners & Degreasers
Price: 14.99 - 129.99 (3 variants)

ONAX Multistar All Purpose Cleaner is a powerful universal cleaner for all interior and exterior vehicle surfaces. Maximum cleaning power featuring the best material compatibility. EXTERIOR: Pre-cleaner for the intensive cleaning of heavily soiled surfaces before car wash. Removes insect residue, grease, oil, gasoline, and diesel grime quickly and effortlessly from glass, paintwork, and plastics. Dilution 1:5 to 1:30 INTERIOR: Removes even the most stubborn stains from roof linings, interior trims, cloth seats, textiles, carpets, and plastic surfaces. Dilution 1:10 to 1:50. Use with bottle valve part # 04977410

entry.title: Sonax Clear Glass Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonax
Type: Vehicle Washing & Glass Cleaning
Price: 11.99 - 129.99 (2 variants)

SONAX Clear Glass Cleaner is a new & improved glass cleaning formula for effortless, streak-free cleaning. Environmentally conscious product contains surfactants made from renewable materials. This glass cleaner quickly removes insect remains and road grime on the outside & film build-up and smoke residue on the inside of your vehicle. Also, great for home use. For best results use SONAX Microfibre cloth Plus Part # 04165000. Use with bottle valve part # 04977410
